backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining cruise deals, itineraries, bookings, reviews, user profiles, branding settings, alerts, logos, and shareable links with access control, storage, and invite-link modules.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module replicating all backend types and returning the previous actor state unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including CSS variables for light and dark themes and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element, metadata, and preloading the default hero image.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component routing between shared itinerary view and the standard app layout with hero, deals, partners, and dialogs.
Component that listens for new unviewed admin alerts and displays them as toast notifications for admin users.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog with tabs for alerts, bookings, logos, branding, and hero settings, fetching data and marking alerts as viewed. Displays lists with loading states and integrates management subcomponents.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin settings dialog showing user role, principal ID, live link section, and controls for assigning admin privileges. Uses identity hooks and mutation to update roles with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Component showing the live app URL with copy/open actions and backend diagnostics info. Fetches diagnostics and displays version, timestamp, and errors.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Booking modal allowing users to select cabins, view totals, and submit a booking for an itinerary. Handles cabin selection, cost calculation, and booking mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Cruise deal card showing image, details, favorite toggle, and itinerary modal. Integrates favorites mutations and dynamically selects destination images.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting cruise line logos with image upload and preview.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Displays grid of cruise line partner logos with loading skeletons and fallback message if none exist.
Dialog showing user's favorite cruise deals, loading states, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto-scrolling carousel with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company branding, navigation links, destination links, social icons, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with authentication, admin options, dialogs, mobile menu, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with dynamic hero image loading, fallback logic, error display, and animated background image.
frontend/src/components/HomepageHeroImag: Component for uploading, validating, previewing, saving, and resetting the homepage hero image.
Displays detailed cruise itinerary info with tabs, booking, sharing, and PDF export options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their name for profile creation.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Fetches, displays, submits, edits, and deletes cruise reviews with rating and comment support.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Provides search and filter controls to query cruises with debounced input and dynamic filters.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Renders a public itinerary page from a shareable link with branding, details, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: React component for viewing, editing, and resetting shared page branding settings with form state and save/reset actions.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Dialog component that displays a user's bookings with itinerary details, status badges, and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook returning a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as deals, itineraries, profiles, bookings, and branding settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global CSS variables and theme palettes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Provides functions to validate CSS color strings and apply safe color styles with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable itinerary PDF by opening a new window and injecting styled HTML content.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Resolves public asset URLs with optional fallbacks for different environments.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Defines default branding and merges backend-provided branding settings with those defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and hash cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, issues, and feature requests for hero image management.
